Test
---
!4 1. Comment one line
!|script|browser test                                                    |
|Go to the Google Test Edit page                                         |
|# Go to line 4                                                          |
|press  |ARROW_DOWN                                                      |
|press  |ARROW_DOWN                                                      |
|press  |ARROW_DOWN                                                      |
|press  |CONTROL+/                                                       |
|ensure |is visible            |xpath=(//span[@class= 'cm-comment'])     |
|click  |Save                                                            |
|ensure |is not visible on page|xpath=(//td[text()= 'open'])             |
|ensure |is not visible on page|xpath=(//a[text()= 'https://google.com'])|
|Go to the Google Test Edit page                                         |
|# Go to line 4                                                          |
|press  |ARROW_DOWN                                                      |
|press  |ARROW_DOWN                                                      |
|press  |ARROW_DOWN                                                      |
|press  |CONTROL+/                                                       |
|ensure |is not visible        |xpath=(//span[@class= 'cm-comment'])     |
|click  |Save                                                            |
|ensure |is visible on page    |xpath=(//td[text()= 'open'])             |
|ensure |is visible on page    |xpath=(//a[text()= 'https://google.com'])|

!4 2. Comment multiple line
!|script|browser test                                                            |
|Go to the Google Test Edit page                                                 |
|press  |CONTROL+SHIFT+END                                                       |
|press  |CONTROL+/                                                               |
|click  |Save                                                                    |
|ensure |is not visible on page|xpath=(//h3[text()= 'Test if google has an img'])|
|ensure |is not visible on page|xpath=(//td[text()= 'storyboard'])               |
|ensure |is not visible on page|xpath=(//td[text()= 'browser test'])             |
|ensure |is not visible on page|xpath=(//td[text()= 'open'])                     |
|ensure |is not visible on page|xpath=(//a[text()= 'https://google.com'])        |
|ensure |is not visible on page|xpath=(//td[text()= 'ensure'])                   |
|ensure |is not visible on page|xpath=(//td[text()= 'is visible on page'])       |
|ensure |is not visible on page|xpath=(//td[text()= 'img[@id='])                 |
|Go to the Google Test Edit page                                                 |
|press  |CONTROL+SHIFT+END                                                       |
|press  |CONTROL+/                                                               |
|click  |Save                                                                    |
|ensure |is visible on page    |xpath=(//h3[text()= 'Test if google has an img'])|
|ensure |is visible on page    |xpath=(//td[text()= 'storyboard'])               |
|ensure |is visible on page    |xpath=(//td[text()= 'browser test'])             |
|ensure |is visible on page    |xpath=(//td[text()= 'open'])                     |
|ensure |is visible on page    |xpath=(//a[text()= 'https://google.com'])        |
|ensure |is visible on page    |xpath=(//td[text()= 'ensure'])                   |
|ensure |is visible on page    |xpath=(//td[text()= 'is visible on page'])       |
